Package org.utilityclient

Class UtilityClient

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.utilityclient.UtilityClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class UtilityClient extends Thread
The Main Class of UtilityClient. Do not create new instances. Instead call getInstance()
Since:
2.0 LTS
Author:
GamingCraft

    • addKeyBind

      public static net.minecraft.client.settings.KeyBinding addKeyBind(String name, int keyCode, boolean isMacro)
      Register a keybinding
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the keybinding. Use I18n.format(String, Object...) if needed.
      keyCode - Currently saved or default keyCode. List with all key codes
      isMacro - Should be false. This adds the keybinding as a macro.
      Returns:
      The KeyBinding object. Use this to check, if the key is currently pressed.
